name: Acute Upper Respiratory Tract Infection
description: Acute infection involving nose, throat, or sinuses presenting with cold, cough, or sore throat.

name: Acute Pharyngitis
description: Inflammation of the pharynx causing sore throat, often viral or bacterial.

name: Acute Tonsillitis
description: Inflammation of tonsils with throat pain, fever, and difficulty swallowing.

name: Acute Bronchitis
description: Acute inflammation of bronchial tubes causing cough and sputum production.

name: Allergic Rhinitis
description: Inflammation of nasal mucosa due to allergens causing sneezing and runny nose.

name: Bronchial Asthma
description: Chronic inflammatory airway disease with episodic wheeze and breathlessness.

name: Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease
description: Chronic airflow limitation commonly associated with smoking.

name: Acute Gastroenteritis
description: Acute inflammation of stomach and intestines causing diarrhea and vomiting.

name: Acid Peptic Disease
description: Gastric acid–related disorder causing epigastric pain or dyspepsia.

name: Gastroesophageal Reflux Disease
description: Reflux of gastric contents causing heartburn and regurgitation.

name: Irritable Bowel Syndrome
description: Functional bowel disorder with abdominal pain and altered bowel habits.

name: Constipation
description: Infrequent or difficult bowel movements.

name: Essential Hypertension
description: Persistently elevated blood pressure without secondary cause.

name: Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
description: Chronic metabolic disorder characterized by hyperglycemia due to insulin resistance.

name: Dyslipidemia
description: Abnormal lipid levels increasing cardiovascular risk.

name: Hypothyroidism
description: Reduced thyroid hormone production causing metabolic slowing.

name: Acute Febrile Illness
description: Short-duration fever without localized source at presentation.

name: Viral Fever
description: Self-limiting febrile illness likely of viral origin.

name: Urinary Tract Infection
description: Infection of urinary tract presenting with dysuria or frequency.

name: Low Back Pain
description: Pain localized to lumbar region with or without radiation.

name: Cervical Spondylosis
description: Degenerative changes in cervical spine causing neck pain or stiffness.

name: Osteoarthritis
description: Degenerative joint disease causing pain and reduced mobility.

name: Myalgia
description: Generalized muscle pain.

name: Sprain / Strain
description: Injury to ligaments or muscles causing pain and swelling.

name: Tension-Type Headache
description: Primary headache disorder with band-like head pain.

name: Migraine
description: Recurrent headache disorder often associated with nausea and photophobia.

name: Vertigo
description: Sensation of spinning or dizziness.

name: Anxiety Disorder
description: Excessive worry or anxiety affecting daily activities.

name: Depressive Disorder
description: Persistent low mood and loss of interest affecting functioning.

name: Sleep Disorder
description: Disturbance in sleep pattern affecting health or functioning.

name: Anemia
description: Reduced hemoglobin concentration causing fatigue and weakness.

name: Iron Deficiency Anemia
description: Anemia due to inadequate iron levels.

name: Dermatitis
description: Inflammatory skin condition with itching and rash.

name: Fungal Skin Infection
description: Superficial fungal infection of skin or nails.

name: Urticaria
description: Allergic skin reaction with itchy wheals.

name: Acne Vulgaris
description: Inflammatory disorder of pilosebaceous units.

name: Dental Caries
description: Tooth decay causing pain or sensitivity.

name: Acute Dental Pain
description: Tooth-related pain requiring dental evaluation.

name: Pediatric Upper Respiratory Infection
description: Common childhood respiratory infection presenting with cold or cough.

name: Pediatric Fever
description: Fever in children requiring age-appropriate evaluation.

name: Pregnancy – Routine Antenatal Care
description: Normal ongoing pregnancy under routine antenatal supervision.

name: Dysmenorrhea
description: Painful menstruation.

name: Polycystic Ovarian Syndrome
description: Hormonal disorder causing irregular periods and hyperandrogenism.

name: Follow-up Visit
description: Review visit for ongoing treatment or test results.

name: General Medical Examination
description: Routine or preventive health check-up.
